bio: This Yo-kai has a monkey's head, a tiger's body, a snake's tail, and a cry that creeps people out—much to his dismay.

soultimate.name: Shock Tactic
soultimate.description: Lightning strikes to deal foes lots of damage.

skill.effect: Techniques take 30% less time to charge.
skill.name: Charge Ahead

name: Chymera
